name: FRESH HERBS Handmade reusable eco storage bag
description: STORE FRESH HERBS IN THE FRIDGE! Our quirky but practical kitchen products are handmade in Melbourne, using 100% certified organic cotton and sustainable hemp blend fabric, and handprinted with original designs using eco-friendly inks. The result is a range of reusable drawstring sacks for fruit, vegetables, ham, bread, herbs and coffee beans that can be used in the fridge, kitchen or pantry. Each machine washable product protects food from harsh, damaging light, whilst allowing air-flow, to maintain optimal food freshness and minimise kitchen waste. The lightweight yet strong and durable storage solutions are also handy for use at the supermarket or farmers market. Used in combination with our tote carry bag, they eliminate the need to use any plastic or disposable paper bags. These eco-friendly homewares are a fun design for your home, and make equally lovely gifts. *Herbs not included. Dimensions: 14” / 35 cm (length) 10.5” / 27 cm (width) Capacity approximation: 1 Large bunch of herbs All prices are exclusive of 10% GST. Customers, please note: GST will not be shown in your order total until you log in to PayPal after checkout. Free shipping within Australia. Please allow approximately 3-5 business days to be shipped.
